Talk_1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>I had such a good day today!<sp:0:4:0>And tomorrow's looking good too.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:1:1:4:00004040>So<sp:5:0:0><sp:1:1:4:0000803f> goodniiight!
Talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Here I go!<sp:5:0:0> I'm going to get to work and
put my good mood to use.
Talk_2010:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Whenever I hear the sound of Pyper's
flute, it brings back such sweet memories.
Talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sure Pyper plans to rejoin the
musical troupe.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Maybe I'll be a little lonelier without
him here...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>He's always tried to keep me feeling
happy. I'll smile just thinking about that.
Talk_2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hee-hee! <sp:5:0:0>The sound of Pyper's flute has
got me energized too!
Talk_1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>His "glowing tree" was so beautiful.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>That's the best gift anyone's ever given
me.<sp:5:1:0> It really,<sp:5:0:0> really<sp:5:0:0> was.
Talk_1022: <sp:3:0:2:0800>And I'm doing well too!<sp:5:0:0> What a good day!
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Honestly...<sp:5:0:0> Where did Pyper go?<sp:0:4:0>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> That "glowing tree" we've been
talking about... He's probably forgotten
his promise to show me one of those.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> hello again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301>Um...<sp:5:0:0> I wanted to say thank you for all
your help earlier.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I was just thinking...<sp:5:0:0> I didn't tell you
about how I met Pyper, did I?<sp:0:4:0>Pyper reached out when I first showed
up looking for work.<sp:5:1:0> He knows it can be
lonely being new.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Ease_01>He's so good at the flute, and he tells
lots of wonderful stories!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201>Sometimes I have to tell him to lay off the
pranks though.<sp:5:0:0> I mean, really...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>But...<sp:5:0:0>I guess most of his jokes are pretty
funny. And I've never felt lonely!<sp:0:4:0>*sigh*<sp:0:4:0><snd:Greeting_01>I love working here. Everyone is so nice.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>And that's why...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I can keep on smiling! I know I can!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Probably...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>Hello, goats...<sp:5:0:0> Hello, cows...<sp:5:0:0> A very nice
day to you...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>Yep!<sp:5:0:0> You're all looking good today.
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Good evening.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Pyper isn't back, even though it's night...<sp:5:1:0>
Honestly, where did he go?
Talk_2002: <sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> All right. What's this all about?
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>Goodbye.<sp:0:4:0>Um...<sp:5:0:0> If you find Pyper,<sp:5:0:0> please let
me know.
Talk_1501:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Doesn't a glowing tree sound pretty,
though? Imagine a tree twinkling away!<sp:0:4:0>I've only seen one in a picture book, but
I'd like to see the real thing, even if it's
just once.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Pyper promised to show me...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>But then he burned down part of the
field here and ran off!<sp:5:1:0> What got into him?
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>I really shouldn't go this far away. I'm
going to head back.
Talk_1502: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Honestly, where has Pyper run off to?
Talk_2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Sad>Oh, there you are...<sp:5:0:0> So, are we going
after all?
Talk_1503:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Hey! Can you believe it...<sp:0:4:0>My friend Pyper lit part of the field
outside on fire, flowers and all.<sp:5:0:0> He's
always trying to get a laugh out of me...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But that wasn't funny. What was he
thinking? He said he was about to show
me a "glowing tree."<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I mean, that sounds nice, but when I saw
what he was about to do...I told him
NOT to.
Still, he did. And THAT happened. And
now he's vanished into thin air!<sp:0:4:0>Well, given it's Pyper,<sp:5:0:0> I bet he's only
hiding somewhere, <clr:0000>playing his flute<clr:ffff>.
